Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM [w2_OrderExtendStatusSetting] WHERE [extend_status_no]='38') BEGIN INSERT [dbo].[w2_OrderExtendStatusSetting] ( [shop_id], [extend_status_no], [extend_status_name], [extend_status_discription], [date_created], [date_changed], [last_changed] ) VALUES ( '0', '38', '【システム使用】振込用紙再送依頼フラグ（後払い決済）', '', GETDATE(), GETDATE(), 'ｗ２ユーザー' ) END GO
